name: Children's Aid and Family Services, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Children's Aid and Family Services, Inc. is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Paramus, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $91.0M in Medicaid payments across 199K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $91.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
